articles.title: Tech News | Microsoft's New Emoji Now Available for Windows 11 - LatestLY
articles.description: Get latest articles and stories on Tech at LatestLY. American tech giant Microsoft will be making its Fluent-style emoji available for Windows 11 this week.
articles.content:
Washington [US], November 23 (ANI): American tech giant Microsoft will be making its Fluent-style emoji available for Windows 11 this week.
